level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor may issue rules, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, to carry out the purposes of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-108
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-108, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-1001.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 6-108, see Mayor's Order 87-47, February 17, 1987.
